data.body:
remove split pane
in /beads, for selected row, show (underneath the title and time since changed / labels section text) a two column "summary" section for description and notes.
do not have titles (e.g. Description) in the columns, just the text.

the total width of the two column section should not exceed or cause the growth beyond what the width of the title column would have been without this new three column section.  Instead the text should wrap.

this new "summary" section should use a smaller font. it should not have dividers or outline borders.  the description column should have a very light green background that matches the pallette. if the notes field is not empty it should have a very light yellow background.  if it is empty it should not have a background color.
